title: [K-12] Quality Improvement Design for Hybrid Mathematics Learning Courses

context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining online/in-person classes, with learning modules structured based on QM (Quality Matters) standards.

learning_goals: Learners can participate in real-time discussions and collaborative activities with over 85% engagement in online learning environments.
Learners can achieve over 70% proficiency in applying mathematical concepts through module-based formative assessments.
Learners can improve learning efficiency by over 20% when transitioning between online and in-person activities by adapting to hybrid class structures.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
